version_description: Golden master version

■Additional Functions/Changes　
・Added new functions to each Event.
・Added requirement functions to Missions.

■Bug Fixes
・Fixed certain display issues.
・Fixed issues with the log-in bonus.
・Fixed issues with the Friend function

■Function Additions/Changes
・Function to promote sale items
・Improved tutorial

■Issue Fixes
・Fixed a failure related to external SDK
・Fixed a failure that occurred when updating the game

Updates
- Added always-accessible Home button
- Updated tutorial
- Added quick formation button
- Added Photo List
- Added slider when purchasing items in Shop
- Updated advertising
- Updated Events
- Increased gameplay spe

Updates/bug fixes
- Adjusted gameplay speed
- Added new events
- Adjusted log-in bonuses
- Adjusted Missions

Bug fixes
- Fixed bugs in formation

- Fixed bugs in formation

Bug fixes

-Fixed bugs related to the log-in bonus
-Fixed bugs in the Home screen

Added/Changed Functions:
・Addition of x10 Creation Function
・Elimination of Creation Slots + Creation Time
・Elimination of Some Items (Express Creation Tickets having to do with the Creation Slot and Creation Time Functions)
